content: Singaporean actor **Maxi Lim Jun Liang** (born 12 March 1987) is a Singaporean actor. ## Early life and education Lim graduated from [Temasek Polytechnic](/wiki/Temasek_Polytechnic) with a diploma in interactive media design. ## Career Lim is best known for playing the comical and eager-to-please "Wayang King" in hit local movie *[Ah Boys to Men](/wiki/Ah_Boys_to_Men_(film_series))* series. He reprised in role in a 2014 musical adaptation of the movie. ## Personal life Lim married actress Liz Teo on 29 March 2020. They announced that they are expecting a child in September. On 29 August, Teo given birth to a baby boy named Reign. In January 2024, they announced their separation. ## Filmography ### Film YearTitleRoleNotesRef2010*Left Hook*FighterShort film2011*Stories*HenchmanShort film*The Invisible Monster*BertShort film*Silence on Set*EdmundShort film*Sanzaru*Short film*Band of Mischief*AlbertShort film*Allegiance*QiangShort film2012*The Truth*AllenVideo short*[Ah Boys to Men](/wiki/Ah_Boys_to_Men)*Recruit Aloysius Jin2013*[Ah Boys to Men 2](/wiki/Ah_Boys_to_Men_2)**Purple Light*Wei JieShort film2014*[The Lion Men](/wiki/The_Lion_Men)*Babyface*The Lion Men: Ultimate Showdown**Dill Doe*Short film2015*Ah Boys to Men 3: Frogmen*3rd Sergeant Aloysius Jin2016*[I Believe](/wiki/I_Believe_(short_film))*AnthonyShort film2017*[Take 2](/wiki/Take_2_(film))*Jian Ren*[Ah Boys to Men 4](/wiki/Ah_Boys_to_Men_4)*Corporal First Class Aloysius Jin2022*[Ah Girls Go Army](/wiki/Ah_Girls_Go_Army)*Captain Aloysius Jin2024*[Money No Enough 3](/wiki/Money_No_Enough_3)*[Police Officer](/wiki/Police_officer) at [Roadblock](/wiki/Roadblock) ### Television series YearTitleRoleNotesRef2012*In Cold Blood: Parental Abuse*Joshua2013*Serangoon Road*Gao Yi2014*[World at Your Feet](/wiki/World_at_Your_Feet_(TV_series))*Jiang Shui2015*[Sealed with a Kiss](/wiki/Sealed_with_a_Kiss_(2015_TV_series))*Du Junjie*[The Dream Makers II](/wiki/The_Dream_Makers_II)*Jack2018–2022[*Kin*](/wiki/Kin_(Singaporean_TV_series))Loh Ah Hock2020*Best Friends Forever* (致2020的我们)2023*[Oppa, Saranghae!](/wiki/Oppa,_Saranghae!)*Ouyang Didi ### Radio show YearTitleNetworkNotes2015*Ning @ Night*[Y.E.S. 93.3FM](/wiki/Y.E.S._93.3FM)[DJ](/wiki/Radio_personality) ## Theater YearTitleRole2014*Ah Boys to Men: The Musical*Aloysius Jin ## Awards and nominations YearAwardCategoryNominated workResult2014[5th Singapore Short Film Awards](/wiki/Singapore_Short_Film_Awards#5th_Singapore_Short_Film_Awards)Best Performance*Dill Doe*Nominated -
